QueryDefinition.Query:
with person as ( SELECT DISTINCT a.patid, yob + 1800 YEAR_OF_BIRTH, case when mob > 0 then mob else null end as MONTH_OF_BIRTH, null DAY_OF_BIRTH, ISNULL(gender, 0) gender, Right(a.patid,3) CARE_SITE_ID, case when a.crd > b.uts then a.crd else b.uts end as observation_period_start_date, case when a.tod IS null and a.deathdate IS null then b.lcd when a.deathdate IS null and a.tod is not null and a.tod < b.lcd then a.tod when a.deathdate IS null and a.tod is not null and a.tod >= b.lcd then b.lcd when a.tod IS null and a.deathdate is not null and a.deathdate < b.lcd then a.deathdate when a.tod IS null and a.deathdate is not null and a.deathdate >= b.lcd then b.lcd when a.deathdate IS not null and a.tod IS not null and a.tod <= b.lcd and a.tod <= a.deathdate then a.tod when a.deathdate IS not null and a.tod IS not null and b.lcd <= a.tod and b.lcd <= a.deathdate then b.lcd when a.deathdate IS not null and a.tod IS not null and a.deathdate <= a.tod and a.deathdate <= b.lcd then a.deathdate else '23-DEC-2099' end as observation_period_end_date, deathdate, toreason, DIED = CASE WHEN toreason = 1 and deathdate is not null and deathdate > '1987-01-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, CASE when c.ethnos='Chinese' then 38003579 when c.ethnos='Bangladesi' then 38003575 when c.ethnos='Pakistani' then 38003589 when c.ethnos='Unknown' then 8552 when c.ethnos='Oth_Asian' then 8515 when c.ethnos='Mixed' then 8522 when c.ethnos='White' then 8527 when c.ethnos='Bl_Afric' then 38003598 when c.ethnos='Indian' then 38003574 when c.ethnos='Bl_Other' then 38003598 when c.ethnos='Bl_Carib' then 38003598 when c.ethnos='Other' then 8522 else null end as RACE_CONCEPT_ID, c.ethnos as RACE_SOURCE_VALUE, a.famnum, a.marital, case when a.marital is null then 0 else 1 end isContainsMarital, case when a.famnum is null then 0 else 1 end isContainsFamnum, CASE a.marital WHEN 0 THEN 45878545 WHEN 1 THEN 45879879 WHEN 2 THEN 45876756 WHEN 3 THEN 45883711 WHEN 4 THEN 45883375 WHEN 5 THEN 45884459 WHEN 6 THEN 45878545 WHEN 7 THEN 4204399 WHEN 8 THEN 45883710 WHEN 9 THEN 45876756 WHEN 10 THEN 4135263 WHEN 11 THEN 4135263 END AS VALUE_AS_CONCEPT_ID, CASE a.marital WHEN 0 THEN 'Data Not Entered' WHEN 1 THEN 'Single' WHEN 2 THEN 'Married' WHEN 3 THEN 'Widowed' WHEN 4 THEN 'Divorced' WHEN 5 THEN 'Separated' WHEN 6 THEN 'Unknown' WHEN 7 THEN 'Engaged' WHEN 8 THEN 'Co-habitating' WHEN 9 THEN 'Remarried' WHEN 10 THEN 'Stable Relationship' WHEN 11 THEN 'Civil Partnership' END AS VALUE_SOURCE_VALUE from {sc}.PATIENT a left outer join {sc}.hes_patient c on c.patid=a.patid JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND a.patid = ch.PERSON_ID join {sc}.practice b on a.pracid = b.pracid where accept = 1)
select *, 44814725 PeriodTypeConceptId from person where observation_period_start_date < observation_period_end_date order by patid
